title: Backend Engineer
description: Growing startup looking for a backend engineer to work on our payment processing platform. Must be in SF office 5 days a week. Tech stack: Python, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS. Experience with payment systems a plus. Requirements: 4+ years backend development, strong Python skills, startup experience preferred.
test_case_notes: On-site only, non-Portland location. Should be filtered out or score lower due to location requirements unless remote preference is flexible.
